short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the live price of Optimism on Coingecko

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension is a simple and easy-to-use tool for keeping track of the live price of Optimism (OP). Using the CoinGecko API, this extension automatically fetches the current price of OP in USD and displays it as a badge on the extension icon. This way, you don't need to open any website or do any research to know the current value of your investment. 

This extension is perfect for anyone who is interested in the cryptocurrency market and wants to stay up to date with the latest price of OP. With this extension, you can track the value of your investment in real-time and make informed decisions about your portfolio. So, download it now and stay informed!
